Name: Elements
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
25 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Greek Bacardí Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Stelios Papadopoulos at 'Amigos' Mexican Bar-Restaurant in Athens, Greece.
